title: geth memory leak, 'ignore' message burst
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.4.6`
OS & Version: Linux
#### Expected behaviour

Not leak memory, don't mass ignore blocks.
#### Actual behaviour

One node in our test network is getting hammered with 'ignore' messages like shown below. The other nodes do not see the ignored, this pressure runs all four cores at 100% and starts to consume RAM that is not released.
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Random testing in network with multiple nodes. Occurs around once a day.
#### Logs
